bibl.title: A Hymn to the Nile.
bibl.note: Pap. Flor. XVIII, 23-32. A poem on the Nile is transcribed on the first and second tablet of a notebook. It was written by a student with a fairly proficient, but not completely regular hand which can be dated to the end of the third or the beginning of the fourth century A.D. Uncorrected transcription of the text, normalized text, translation and commentary.
CRIBIORE Raffaella, A Hymn to the Nile.
